name: Exploring the original coastal esclerophic forest from Concepción
description: This triip is a trail-trekking trough Pedro del Río Zañartu Park, inside the Peninsula de Hualpén Sanctuary of Nature declared by the ministry of national monuments on 1976. The park is close to Concepción City on south center of Chile. Have unique trees, plants, and animals beacuse is a transition zone between mediterranean and template wheather. Also have coastal especies influence, and special conditions of humidity thats make a hot spot of biodiversity. We goin to do some ambiental interpretation of the nature process and ecosystems, during a 3 hours trekkings, about 10 kilometres. Lots of interesting points like views, mushrooms, birds, local fauna, beaches, hills, sea, river, lagoon, etc.
